u.a: lulu wəʊn tʌ [*] maı lıtʊ fi:ti [*]
final consonant deleted in "touch"; voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless labio-dental fricative and second element of cluster omitted in "sweetie";
voiced dental fricative replaced voiced alveolar plosive; voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative;
voiceless palato-alveolar affricate and voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricatives;

g.ga: I don't want Daddy to read to me

u.a: voiced dental fricative replaced by voiced alveolar plosive;
voiceless alveolar fricatives replaced by voiceless dental fricatives;
t/d distinction on basis of aspiration still erratic
voiceless glottal fricative replaced by voiceless labio-dental fricative; bilabial nasal replaced by alveolar nasal;

g.ga: I want to read that one
it's going to bite my finger
Mummy must blow on it to cool it

dædi laık sʌm mɔ: ti: mʌmi

g.ga: please may I have that in a little while ?
